name: 6.17 "To All the Girls..." Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Lilith say her best friend was?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Lilith didn't really have friends. She said that Rebecca was her best friend because they have talked on occasion.

Sam.

	As best man, it was Sam's job to throw a bachelor party for Frasier. During the party Frasier started to have doubts about getting married.

questions.text: What offer did Lilith make Frasier?
questions.correct: The chance to back out of getting married
options: The chance to go to Hawaii
questions.explanation:
The chance to back out of getting married.

	Frasier kept making jokes about getting married, Lilith took that as a sign he didn't want to get married. She told him to call her if he decided to go through with the wedding.

questions.text: Who did Fraiser quote when he said "Everyone have fun tonight. Everyone ____________________________ tonight".
questions.explanation:
Wang Chung.

	Wang Chung was an 80's new wave group. Frasier quoted them to start off his bachelor party.

questions.text: Who did Norm say he would choose if he could have any woman?
questions.explanation:
Jill Eikenberry.

	Jill Eikenberry played Ann Kelsey on "L.A. Law". Norm found her attractive because on the show she was married to "the short dumpy guy".

questions.text: Who did Frasier say he would chose if he could have any woman (besides Lilith)?
questions.explanation:
Loni Anderson.

	Loni Anderson was on "WKRP in Cincinnati" Frasier said Lilith first but the guys razzed him and told him he couldn't pick her.

questions.text: Who was the stripper at Frasier's party?
questions.explanation:
one of his patients.

	Frasier stopped her from stripping which annoyed the other men. He told her that it wouldn't go well with her parents.

Cliff.

	When Frasier decided he still wanted to marry Lilith he took offense to Cliff's words. They were going to fight but they had a list of places where they couldn't hit each other By the time they finished the list Cliff had writer's cramp.

yes.

	Carla answered the phone and never gave Lilith the message. Lilith thought that Frasier changed his mind. She got really drunk at her bridal shower and was all over the male stripper.

questions.text: What words did Lilith say she will always cherish?
questions.correct: "Lilith, I want to marry you anyway."
questions.explanation:
"Lilith, I want to marry you anyway."

	Lilith thought she lost Frasier because of her behavior with the male stripper but he said "Lilith, I want to marry you anyway." He asked her to promise two things 1) "Never leave me for another" 2) "Don't throw up on me in the cab."
